title: Team Formation
description: Find a team to bring your project ambitions to life!

title: Hackathons 101
description: First time venturing in a hackathon? Catch this workshop to learn the in's and out's of the hackathon!

title: Opening Ceremony
description: Join us in launching this weekend at TechTogether Boston's Opening Ceremony!

title: Team Formation
description: Find a team to bring your project ambitions to life!

title: Code Collaboration 101 - Guide to Github and Git
description: Want to work with other adventurers for your project? This workshop will teach you how to smoothly collaborate on coding using Git and Github!

title: Web Development 101 Series - HTML + CSS
description: Creating a website can be overwhelming! In the first part of the Web Dev 101 Series, you'll learn HTML and CSS to build the backbone of your site.

title: Web Development 101 Series - Javascript
description: Following the first part of the Web Dev 101 Series, you'll learn to use Javascript to make your website interactive!

title: MLH Fun Activity: Capture the Flag
Team Formation
description: Find a team to bring your project ambitions to life!

title: Prototyping/Wireframing For Your Project with Figma
description: Planning is an important part before embarking on your adventure! Here, you'll learn to plan out your project through (prototyping) with Figma!

title: Web Development 101 Series - MERN Stack
description: In the final part of the Web Dev 101 Series, you'll learn all about the elusive MERN Stack that maximizes your website's potential!

title: Deploy Your React App to the Cloud
description: React, Angular and Vue are some of the most popular frameworks for building web apps. In this workshop you will learn how to deploy a static web app to the cloud directly from GitHub with Azure Static Web Apps. We then create a simple backend API with the help of Azure Functions. Finally, we put everything together and publish our backend and updated frontend.
